15.Syed Vickar Ahamed: (The Supreme) Owner of the Throne of Glory

16.Syed Vickar Ahamed: (He) does everything (without an exception) that He intends to do

17.Syed Vickar Ahamed: Has the story reached you (O Prophet,) of the forces—

18.Syed Vickar Ahamed: Of Firon (Pharaoh) and of Samood (Thamud

19.Syed Vickar Ahamed: No! Yet the unbelievers reject (the Truth)

20.Syed Vickar Ahamed: And Allah does overtake them from behind

21.Syed Vickar Ahamed: No! (But) this is a Glorious Quran

22.Syed Vickar Ahamed: (Written) within a tablet preserved (to last forever)

1.Syed Vickar Ahamed: By the sky (the heaven) and by the Visitor by the night

2.Syed Vickar Ahamed: And what will explain to you what is the Visitor by the night —

3.Syed Vickar Ahamed: The shinning Star of intense brightness—

4.Syed Vickar Ahamed: There is no soul without a Protector over it

5.Syed Vickar Ahamed: Now, let man only think from what he is created

6.Syed Vickar Ahamed: He is created from a drop emitted—

7.Syed Vickar Ahamed: Proceeding from between the backbone and the ribs

8.Syed Vickar Ahamed: Surely (Allah) is able to bring him back (to life)

9.Syed Vickar Ahamed: The Day that (all) things secret will be tested

10.Syed Vickar Ahamed: (Man) will have no power and no helper

11.Syed Vickar Ahamed: By the sky that returns (with rains again and again)

12.Syed Vickar Ahamed: And by the earth which opens out (for the gushing springs or the budding plants)—

13.Syed Vickar Ahamed: Watch! This is the Word that separates out (Good from evil)

14.Syed Vickar Ahamed: It is not a thing for amusement

15.Syed Vickar Ahamed: As for them (the disbelievers), they are only plotting a scheme

16.Syed Vickar Ahamed: And I am planning a Scheme

17.Syed Vickar Ahamed: Therefore (O Prophet!) give a little time for the disbelievers: Bear with them gently (for a while)

87.SurahEnglishNames: The Most High, Glory to your Lord in the Highest

1.Syed Vickar Ahamed: Praise (and Glorify) the Name of your Lord, the Most High (Rab-Al-A'la)

2.Syed Vickar Ahamed: Who has created, and given form and proper size

3.Syed Vickar Ahamed: Who has prescribed laws (to live by) and given you guidance (in His Books)

4.Syed Vickar Ahamed: And Who grows the (green and rich) pasture

5.Syed Vickar Ahamed: And then makes it dry and stalky (with grain)

6.Syed Vickar Ahamed: By small amounts We shall teach you (O Prophet!) To declare (the Message), so that you shall not forget

7.Syed Vickar Ahamed: Except as Allah wills for He knows what is openly known and what is hidden

8.Syed Vickar Ahamed: And We will make it easy for you (to follow) the simple (Path)

9.Syed Vickar Ahamed: Therefore give guidance in case the guidance will profit (the listener)

10.Syed Vickar Ahamed: The guidance will be received by those who fear (Allah

11.Syed Vickar Ahamed: But it will be avoided by those most unfortunate ones

12.Syed Vickar Ahamed: Who will enter the great Fire

13.Syed Vickar Ahamed: In which they will neither die nor live

14.Syed Vickar Ahamed: But those will prosper, who purify themselves

15.Syed Vickar Ahamed: And praise the Name of their Guardian-Lord and (purify their hearts) in prayer

16.Syed Vickar Ahamed: But no! You prefer the life of this world

17.Syed Vickar Ahamed: But the Hereafter is better and (it) lasts longer

18.Syed Vickar Ahamed: And this is in the pages (of Books) of the very early (Revelations)—

19.Syed Vickar Ahamed: The pages (of Books) of Ibrahim (Abraham) and Musa (Moses)

88.SurahEnglishNames: The Overwhelming, The Overwhelming Calamity, The Pall

1.Syed Vickar Ahamed: Has the story of The Overwhelming (Event) reached you

2.Syed Vickar Ahamed: On that Day, some faces will suffer humiliation

3.Syed Vickar Ahamed: Working (hard in) weariness—

4.Syed Vickar Ahamed: While they enter the blazing Fire—

5.Syed Vickar Ahamed: While they are given, from a boiling hot spring (fluid), to drink

6.Syed Vickar Ahamed: No food will there be for them but a bitter Dhari’ (a dry, bitter and thorny fruit

7.Syed Vickar Ahamed: Which will neither nourish nor satisfy hunger

8.Syed Vickar Ahamed: On that Day (other) faces will be joyful

9.Syed Vickar Ahamed: Pleased with their struggle (of this life)—

10.Syed Vickar Ahamed: In a Garden raised high

11.Syed Vickar Ahamed: Where they shall not hear (empty words)

12.Syed Vickar Ahamed: In there will be a bubbling spring

13.Syed Vickar Ahamed: In there will be Thrones (of dignity), raised high

14.Syed Vickar Ahamed: Cups placed (ready)

15.Syed Vickar Ahamed: And cushions set in rows

16.Syed Vickar Ahamed: And rich carpets spread out

17.Syed Vickar Ahamed: Do they (the unbelievers) not look at the Camels, how they are made

18.Syed Vickar Ahamed: And at the sky, how it is raised high

19.Syed Vickar Ahamed: And at the mountains, how they are fixed firm

20.Syed Vickar Ahamed: And at the earth, how it is spread out

21.Syed Vickar Ahamed: Therefore you (O Prophet) give Guidance: For you are the one to guide

22.Syed Vickar Ahamed: You are not the one to manage (men’s) affairs

23.Syed Vickar Ahamed: But if any (one) turns away and rejects Allah—

24.Syed Vickar Ahamed: Allah will punish him with a severe punishment
